Connect observations in the vertical direction

Source: R/ggstrat-geoms.R
geom_lineh.Rd

Connect observations in the vertical direction

geom_lineh(
  mapping = NULL,
  data = NULL,
  stat = "identity",
  position = "identity",
  na.rm = FALSE,
  show.legend = NA,
  inherit.aes = TRUE,
  ...
)

Arguments

mapping, data, stat, position, na.rm, show.legend, inherit.aes, ...

See geom_line.

Value

A ggplot2 layer.
